page.title: 11LEISURE
page.content: { LEISURE IN LEIGH AND BRANSFORD Leisure pursuits are many and varied. There is horse riding within the area and at Bensfield the Ever- green Club has Bingo sessions. Other activities take place at the local Memorial Hall, in nearby villages, in Malvern and Worcester. For young people there are Brownies, Guides, Cubs, Youth Club and Swimming Club. Adults are offered clubs for garden- ing, cycling, clay pigeon and rifle shooting and squash, as well as a Wine Circle and Women's Institute. A Sports Centre is easily accessible in St. John's, on the outskirts of Worcester. There is an annual village show and occasional dances at the Memorial Hall. Fishing and gardening are favourite pursuits, as well as television and, increasingly, home computers.
